SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.TUI

Class ChatView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.view.TUI.ChatView
public class ChatView extends Object
The ChatView class represents the chat view in the game. It handles the display of the global and private chat messages. It also processes the chat updates and updates the chat view accordingly.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatView

      public ChatView(GameView gameView)
      Constructs a new ChatView with the specified game view. Sets the instance of this class to this newly created object.
      Parameters:
      gameView - the game view to be used

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ChatView getInstance(GameView gameView)
      Returns the singleton instance of the ChatView. If the instance is null, a new ChatView is created with the specified game view.
      Parameters:
      gameView - the game view to be used
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of the ChatView

    • getInstance

      public static ChatView getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the ChatView.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of the ChatView

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializes the ChatView. Sets the started flag to true and updates the chat with the messages in the chat updates queue.

    • updateChat

      public void updateChat(Stack<String> messages)
      Updates the chat with the specified messages. If the ChatView has not started, the messages are added to the chat updates queue. Otherwise, a new TUIUpdateTask is created and started in a new thread.
      Parameters:
      messages - the messages to update the chat with

    • closeChat

      public void closeChat()
      Closes the ChatView. Sets the started flag to false.

    • getGlobalMessages

      public ArrayList<String> getGlobalMessages()
      Returns the global messages.
      Returns:
      a new ArrayList containing the global messages

    • getPrivateMessages

      public ArrayList<String> getPrivateMessages()
      Returns the private messages.
      Returns:
      a new ArrayList containing the private messages

    • printGlobalChat

      public void printGlobalChat()
      Prints the global chat. Waits for the latch to reach zero, then prints the global chat messages.

    • printPrivateChat

      public void printPrivateChat()
      Prints the private chat. Prints the private chat messages.

    • handleSendMessage

      public void handleSendMessage(String message)
      Handles the sending of a message. Calls the sendMessage method of the game view with the specified message.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send

    • setChatOpen

      public void setChatOpen(Boolean isChatOpen)
      Sets whether the chat is open. Calls the isChatOpen method of the game view with the specified value.
      Parameters:
      isChatOpen - true if the chat is open, false otherwise

    • setPrivateChatOpen

      public void setPrivateChatOpen(Boolean isPrivateChatOpen)
      Sets whether the private chat is open. Calls the isPrivateChatOpen method of the game view with the specified value.
      Parameters:
      isPrivateChatOpen - true if the private chat is open, false otherwise

    • getGameView

      public GameView getGameView()
      Returns the game view.
      Returns:
      the game view

    • setCountDownLatch

      public void setCountDownLatch()
      Sets the count-down latch. Creates a new CountDownLatch with a count of 1.

    • timerUpdate

      public void timerUpdate()
      Updates the timer. Sleeps the current thread for 500 milliseconds.
